message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a great deal for you, as it's worth $1,000,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you're trying to be mindful of your budget, but $850,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This is still a great deal for you, given the product's value to you. Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
